name: Windows - Modify file last modified timestamp with PowerShell
description:
Modifies the file last modified timestamp of a specified file. This technique was seen in use by the Stitch RAT.
To verify execution, use File Explorer to view the Properties of the file and observe that the Modified time is the year 1970.

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: A file must exist at the path (#{file_path}) to change the modified time on

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: A file must exist at the path (#{file_path}) to change the modified time on

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: A file must exist at the path (#{file_path}) to change the modified time on

input_arguments.name: target_date_time
input_arguments.description: Date/time to replace original timestamps with

input_arguments.name: file_path
input_arguments.description: Path of file to change modified timestamp
